summary: This is a Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General transcription request form for an audio interview with Michael Thomas conducted on August 17, 2021. The form provides administrative details about the request, including case number, agent information, and approval signatures.

persons.name: Michael Thomas
persons.context: Person who is the subject of an audio interview to be transcribed, scheduled for August 17, 2021.

persons.name: Tova Noel
persons.context: Listed in the 'Names and Unfamiliar Terms' field of the transcription request form.

events.title: Scheduled Interview with Michael Thomas
events.description: Audio interview with Michael Thomas scheduled to be recorded for transcription by the DOJ OIG.

keyFacts: The document is a DOJ OIG transcription request form for case number 2019010614.
An audio interview with Michael Thomas was scheduled for August 17, 2021, with a length of 3 hours, 47 minutes, and 8 seconds.
The form includes administrative terms like TRUVIEW, SENTRY, SHU, FLETC, DOJ OIG, and SAMS.
The form was approved by an office SAC/ASAC on June 21, 2021.
